body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Adam Rodriguez and I represent XYZ Car Dealership. May I have the pleasure of knowing your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Theresa. Can you please provide your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven zero three - five five five - eight one two zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And may I also have your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing your contact information. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today, Theresa?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm actually surprised by the shipping delay of my car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Theresa. Let me look into this matter for you. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Theresa. I will investigate the shipping delay and get back to you soon. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Adam. I appreciate your help. Goodbye.
